movie.title: Die Hard
movie.plot: NYPD cop John McClane's plan to reconcile with his estranged wife is thrown for a serious loop when, minutes after he arrives at her office, the entire building is overtaken by a group of terrorists. With little help from the LAPD, wisecracking McClane sets out to single-handedly rescue the hostages and bring the bad guys down.
movie.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 2 nominations.
